result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Andrew J E Bruss

records.addlTxt:
10:12 AM Defendant Andrew J E Bruss appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Gabriel Andres Pollak appeared by video for Andrew J E Bruss.  Attorney James Jay Rennicke Esq appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Def appearing from Barron County Jail. Case on for Status Conference.  Defense attorney updates the Court: agreement reached, Court required additional basis for agreement RE: public's interest.  Discussion of agreement; State argues in support.  Def requests breakout session.  Off the record 10:19 AM.  Back on the record 10:21 AM, same appearances.
Status conference scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Status conference on November 7, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Andrew J E Bruss
Current: 1000 Lakeshore Drive, Moose Lake, MN 55767 United States  (Effective: 10-05-2022)
Prior: 7704 Horseshoe Dr, Siren, WI 54872

10:10 AM Defendant Andrew J E Bruss appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Gabriel Andres Pollak in court for Andrew J E Bruss.  Prosecuting attorney Kevin Thomas Schmidt in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Def appearing from Bayfield County jail.  Def on interstate detainer.  Court resetting because conflict for ADA Schmidt and DA Rennicke unavailable.  Atty Pollak must contact DA Rennicke to try and get this resolved shortly, given the detainer.  Atty Pollak notes an agreement has been reached.  Court notes she needed DA Rennicke to provide a basis for the agreement.  State needs to provide in writing the basis for the agreement to the Court.
Status conference scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 10:00 am.  Def updates address should be changed to the Moose Lake Correctional Facility.
Status conference on October 31, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Status conference on October 5, 2022 at 10:00 am.

10:07 AM Defendant Andrew J E Bruss appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Gabriel Andres Pollak in court for Andrew J E Bruss.  Prosecuting attorney Kevin Thomas Schmidt in court for the State of Wisconsin. Case on for Status Conference.  Def on interstate detainer. Def appearing from Bayfield County jail. Defense attorney updates the Court: def has accepted the offer, but Court requires basis for agreement; State needs Atty Rennicke to provide that (conflict for ADA Schmidt).  
Status conference scheduled for September 21, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Status conference on September 21, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
3:05 PM Called 22CF119 scheduled for PH.  Prosecuting attorney James Jay Rennicke Esq in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Andrew J E Bruss in court.  Attorney Gabriel Andres Pollak in court for Andrew J E Bruss.  Off the record Attny Pollak said today would be a WOPH.  Court reviews WOPH with def.  Case 22CF119 on for Waiver of Preliminary Hearing:  Court informs def of rights to PH; waived by def.  Court finds waiver of right to PH knowingly, freely, voluntarily made.  Court finds factual basis for bind over.  State files information which mirrors the criminal complaint.  Case on for Arraignment.  Defendant acknowledges receipt of information, def. waives reading.  Court informs def. of charges, possible penalties and rights.  NG plea entered to all counts. Ready to set a PLEAS.  State provides background, offer to amend Ct 1 to simple possession of meth class I felony, plea on that DRI ct 2, joint recommendation for concurrent time or probation to MN sentence.  Def in prison in MN until June 24, 2024. Court makes a statement regarding amendment.  State replies, key witness/CI in prison.  Court and state discuss matter.  Court shares the position of the court on this matter.
Status conference scheduled for September 15, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Status conference on September 15, 2022 at 10:00 am.

3:01 PM Prosecuting attorney Kevin Thomas Schmidt in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Andrew J E Bruss in court, in custody.  Attorney Gabriel Andres Pollak in court for Andrew J E Bruss. Case on for a Return on Warrant/Initial Appearance.  Warrant is quashed.  Defendant acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading.  Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def on detainer.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 11, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on August 11, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
